definition[0]: the process of finding new people to join a company, organization, the army etc
example[0]: A recruitment drive to attract new members is underway.
definition[1]: the process or the business of recruiting new people
example[3]: Recruitment is difficult at the moment.
example[4]: the recruitment of new sales people
definition[2]: an occasion when someone is recruited
example[5]: They are engaged on a temporary basis until permanent recruitments can be made.
